attributes.action: Big Companies must Pay their Tax
attributes.additional_details: It has recently been reported that while the Country endures Austerity Cuts to save approximately £6 Billion, large companies have been allowed to dodge Tax Payments equating to around £25 Billion.  This is totally unjustified while vital services are cut and displays yet again the reliance on the Taxpayer to foot the bill.  These companies must be made to pay.
